overview: COMPANY We are an authorized distributor of several brand names in business technologymanagement. Our solutions include integrated solutions package bar code andRFID solutions (identification technology by Radio Frequency) system point of sale (POS), ordering system triggered by consumer office back door and thecentralized management system at headquarters. We provide services to plan, design and install, depending on your budget and requirements and technical specifications of the customer. MISSION Become the leading company in the region in providing enterprise solutions are competitive and meet customer needs. A STAFF The labor force of our qualified engineers include high-quality training and dedication, who are commissioned to meet customer satisfaction. To keep abreast of the latest advances in information technology, our engineers receiveregular training from our suppliers overseas. TVINTEC Co., Ltd. has strategic alliances with technology partners, the companythe market leader in its field. The strategic alliance gives us the ability to use best available technology to provide top service to customers. COMMITMENT In TVINTEC Co., Ltd, based on a large variety of resources and the monitoring data has been verified, we are committed to providing professional solutions, economic, rapid, accurate, and efficient in all your projects.
